word: A few nights since, I dreamed that I was praying in a meeting. Oh how earnestly my heart was drawn out in supplication! "Lord," I pleaded, "Let not this people claiming to believe so sacred a truth follow on in their mistaken ideas until their names are blotted out of the book of life and recorded among the names of the unjust. Help them to see that by their unlikeness to Christ they are greatly dishonoring the Lord."
